snippet: A coalition of civil rights groups have filed a lawsuit to stop Alabama from publishing the names of all illegal immigrants arrested in the state.
abstract: Coalition of civil rights groups files lawsuit to stop Alabama from publishing names of all illegal immigrants arrested in the state.
lead_paragraph: A coalition of civil rights groups have filed a lawsuit to stop Alabama from publishing the names of all illegal immigrants arrested in the state.

headline.main: Alabama: Suit Seeks to Stop Naming of Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Suit Seeks To Stop Naming of Immigrants
